verses.name: Luke 20:5
verses.text: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then believed ye him not?

verses.name: Luke 20:6
verses.text: But and if we say, Of men; all the people will stone us: for they be persuaded that John was a prophet.

verses.name: Luke 20:7
verses.text: And they answered, that they could not tell whence it was.

verses.name: Luke 20:8
verses.text: And Jesus said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.
